resources.string: R E G I S T E R

string-array.name: item_name
string-array.item: KBD75 V3.1 Mechanical Keyboard with Cement Grey Japanese Keycaps
Black Blade60 Hot-swap Keyboard with EnjoyPBT Keycaps
TOFU65 Mechanical Keyboard With EPBT Black Japanese Keycaps
TOFU84 Acrylic Soldered 75% Mechanical Keyboard With MAXKEY Pink&White Keycaps
TOFU65 Black Mechanical Keyboard with EPBT Wob Keycaps
KBD75 V2 Mechancial Keyboard with F22 Keycaps
KBD75 V2 Soldered Customized Mechanical Keyboard DIY Kit

string-array.name: item_desc
string-array.item:
Spec:
 - Soldered PCB: KBD75 Rev 2.0 solder PCB (PCB0005) (with RGB underglow)
 - Hot-swap PCB: KBD75 hot swap PCB (RGB underglow, no Per-key RGB)
 - Typing angle: 7°
 - Interface: Type-C
 - Case: Top-mount, Aluminum material 75% layout, Acrylic mid-layer
 - Plate: Brass\Aluminum Plate
 - Stabs: Cherry screw-in stabs 60set x1
 - Keycaps: DP2787
 - PCB foam: Put it between PCB and Plate
 - Case foam: Put it between PCB and Case
 - Weight bar: Aluminum material default


Include:
 - PCB x1
 - Case x1
 - Plate x1
 - Keycaps x1
 - PCB foam x1
 - Case foam x1
 - Stabs 60 set x1
 - USB-C cable x1
 - Screws and rubber feet

Specs:
 - Blade 60% Aluminum Case
 - O-RING Mount
 - 7° Type angle
 - DZ60RGB V2 hot swap PCB / DZ60RGB-ANSI hot swap PCB (with per-key RGB on the top)
 - Cherry Screw-in stabs 60 set
 - Contains a 3 mm Bottom Foam
 - Four screw posts and one threaded hole to make the PCB more elastic.


Include:
 - Case x1
 - PCB x1
 - Stabilizers 60 set x1
 - ePBT Keycaps: Black-Gold (SKU DP1015) x1 or WOB (SKU DP0299) x1
 - Bottom foam x1
 - USB-C cable x1
 - Screws and rubber feet

Specs:
 - Hot-swap version (DZ65RGB V3 hot-swap PCB) with Per-key RGB
 - Soldered version (KBD67 Rev 2 soldered PCB) with RGB underglow
 - Layouts: ANSI or ISO layout
 - Support VIA configurator
 - EnjoyPBT Black Japanese 148 Keycaps Set (SKU: C0032)
 - Cherry Profile
 - Dye-sub PBT material
 - Tofu65 case
 - Cherry screw-in stabs 60 set
 - Aluminum/ Brass/ PC plate
 - USB-C interface


Include
 - Keycaps x1
 - PCB x1
 - Case x1
 - Plate x1
 - Stabs 60set x1
 - USB-C cable x1
 - Rubber feet and screws

Specs:
 - Tray Mount
 - 75% layout
 - Tofu84 Acrylic
 - KBD75 V2 Soldered version PCB
 - RGB underglow, NOT Per-key RGB
 - Aluminum plate
 - Type-C interface
 - ABS Doubleshot SA Profile Keycaps


Include:
 - Case x1
 - PCB x1
 - Plate x1
 - Case foam (Put between case and PCB) x1
 - Cherry screw-in stabs 60 set x1
 - USB-C cable x1
 - Maxkey Pink&White SA Keycaps set x1 (JM0556)

Specs:
 - DZ65RGB V3 hot-swap PCB with Per-key RGB
 - KBD67 Rev 2 soldered PCB with RGB underglow
 - Support VIA configurator
 - EnjoyPBT WOB ABS Doubleshot 153 Cherry Profile Keycaps (DP0299)
 - Tofu65 Aluminum Black case
 - Cherry screw-in stabs
 - Aluminum/ Brass/ PC plate
 - USB-C interface


Include:
 - Keycaps x1
 - PCB x1
 - Case x1
 - Plate x1
 - Stabs 60set x1
 - USB-C cable x1
 - PCB foam x1
 - Case foam x1
 - Rubber feet and screws

Include:
 - Anodized KBD75 V2 Aluminum Case
 - KBD75 PCB Type-c (RGB underglow, soldered version)
 - Support VIA Configurator
 - Brass plate
 - Cherry screw-in stabs
 - MAXKEY F22 SA Keycaps DP0880
 - Screws and rubber feet
 - Acrylic mid-layer
 - USB-C cable
 - The end key is R2 Profile

Specs:
 - Gasket Mount
 - 75% Layout
 - Soldered Version PCB
 - Designer: KBDfans Wei


Include:
 - Case: top aluminum case and bottom aluminum case
 - PCB: soldered version, type-c interface, support VIA configurator (SKU: PCB0005, KBD75 REV 2.0 PCB)
 - Plate: silver aluminum plate
 - Stabilizers: Cherry screw-in stabs 60 sets (SKU: DP0003)
 - Foams: case foam x 1 (SKU: DP0501)+ PCB foam x 1 (SKU: DP1393)
 - Gaskets: 1 set (SKU: DP0589)
 - Rubber feet and Screws

Specs:
 - Fully programmable via QMK software
 - RGB Underglow
 - Compact and efficient 75% layout
 - Made in China


Includes:
 - Anodized aluminum case
 - KBD75 Rev 2.0 Soldered PCB
 - Brass\Aluminium Plate(Tofu84) (support to split spacebar)
 - Cherry screw-in stabs 60 set
 - Screws and rubber feet
 - Acrylic mid-layer
